column5: Congrats! I hope health and happiness follow you and your family! HH

Holy smokies that is a big beautiful baby!!!   Congratulations to you and the wife!!!  9 14.....oh my....I hope they gave her some good meds!  lol   Congrats again and I wish all of you the very best!!!  bly
Ha ha!  That's awesome. Congratulations!!!!
wow big boy!  congrats!  cheers!
Truly moved by your post, good luck Verno, family the best thing ever love it all  regards Clive

Congratulations to the whole family! The little guy's a sweetie & big brother is a real cutie too! I agree with you - there's something beautiful about a woman who's just given birth - what a miracle!!!! DebS
Nice one Verno and family 9 pounds wow. I thought you were talking about a pickeral. Congrats.

lol, here I thought I was going to be reading about a fish.  Well I guess in a way I am.  What a catch you are for your wife - she really does look beautiful and how very moving for you to express that.  All the best to you, your wife and your boys.
Congratulations, Verno.  Glad to hear everyone is happy and healthy.  Sincerely, Doug
What bly said...LOL  Congrats...you have a beautiful familiy.
Congratulations bud and all the best to you and your family..Almost 10 LBS wow!

Havent had much time for fishing.  The missus was carrying our second child and she was past due and uncomfortable.  We made it the whole 9 months without finding out what flavour the new baby was going to be.  And finally on Monday morning he arrived, kicking and screaming. 9 lb 14 ozs and 27 inches long we got to meet our new son.  His big brother is all over him and loves holding him and singing to him.  I told the boy that since he's a big brother now, he's not a little boy anymore, he's now a mancub. Here's a pic of the crew.  My wife hates the picture but I can't think of a time when she's been more beautiful
If & when your wife reads this post, you've just earned a years worth of Brownie points  Congrats on the new addition Verno, you've got alot to be proud of there !!!!
Whoo Hoo! Now that's a Keeper   Congrats to all of you !!!  Maureen
Congrat's, that's big news!
LOL 9. 14, 27 inches? Wow a Whopper! Good looking family!
God bless you and your family, Verno. A beautiful picture and a widened and well lit path for the rest of your life.
Congratulations to you and your  brand new fambly!  The whole creating life thingy is a wonder, fer sure.
Congrats!
Thanks for sharing yer life and  lifes wonder.  Congrats to you and the whole family.  You did good,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
congrats.Say that's a keeper
Atta boy!
Awesome, and congrats..
congrats for sure!!!!!!!!!!
WTG Verno and family.  Regads, Sam
WTG Congrats

Seeing the creation of new life is just awesome!...it is amazing what a couples love can achieve!... and without love... you and me and your grandfathers grandfather would not be here... (ok  ok ok There is Maury Povich!) But seriously, congrats brother and enjoy every minute of it! I wish you and you lovely wife all the best!   Gerritt.
Congrats!!!  27".....wow....what a LONG baby!!  dk
Wonderful News! Congrats to you and the Missus on the birth of your new big bundle of boy joy.  Cheers, 1leg
Nothing better in the world.
Congrats Verno ... looks like everyone is going great.  Definitely some keepers.
Congratulations! Hes a big one!
LOL and yes, I do want a bass with the same measurements!
thanks for sharing! All the best and Congrats on the lifetime PB!
perfect!
CONGRATS TO YOU AND THE MRS BRO!!! 9lber is a good haul!!!
